sourcesContent:
import React, {useMemo, useState} from "react"; import styles from './details-ingredient.module.css' import {data} from "../../../../utils/data"; const DetailsIngredient = () => { const ingredient = data.find(({data}) => data._id === '_id'); return ( <>

  • {ingredient.name}

    • Калории, ккал

      {ingredient.calories}

    • Белки, г

      {ingredient.proteins}

    • Жиры, г

      {ingredient.fat}

    • Углеводы, г

      {ingredient.carbohydrates}
    • ) } export default DetailsIngredient;
